name: From the Grave (RetroLegend)
description:
A game made for a UW Tacoma Game Jam with the theme of "Halloween."

A beat-'em-up style game where you play as a vampire searching for the reason why the undead are rising.
WASD to Move
SPACE to Jump
LEFT CLICK to Attack (grounded combo attack and mid-air attack)

Game and Assets made by Bailey Christie
Music made by Liam Escame

Made in Construct 3
Sound Effects from freesound.org
